# Christian Lambillotte - Poetry Collection

> A personal collection of French poems by Christian Lambillotte, presented in an elegant digital format.

This website showcases original poetry written by Christian Lambillotte, a Belgian poet. The site features an interactive reading experience where poems can be viewed in a fullscreen modal with smooth animations.

## Poems

- [30 ans en 30 lignes](https://www.christianlambillotte.be/30-ans-en-30-lignes.html): A reflection on turning thirty, life lessons, and the passage of time.
- [L'essentiel retrouvé ?](https://www.christianlambillotte.be/l-essentiel-retrouve.html): A meditation on humanity, friendship, and fraternity in difficult times.
- [Anaïs](https://www.christianlambillotte.be/anais.html): A tender poem dedicated to the poet's granddaughter.
- [Le foetus et le squelette](https://www.christianlambillotte.be/le-foetus-et-le-squelette.html): A philosophical dialogue between a fetus and a skeleton about life and death.
- [Ode à la pomme de terre](https://www.christianlambillotte.be/ode-a-la-pomme-de-terre.html): A humorous ode celebrating the potato in all its forms.
- [L'Orpheline de guerre](https://www.christianlambillotte.be/l-orpheline-de-guerre.html): A poignant poem from the perspective of a young war orphan.
